name: DURF: Pocket Mod Character Journal
description:
A simple pocket mod character journal (sheet) for DURF.

Featuring:

  • Official DURF artwork by Emiel Boven
  • Original DURF character sheet assets, reformatted for this Pocket Mod
  • Section for taking notes
  • Character description detail tables from Cairn by Yochai Gal
  • Hexcrawl map for exploration tracking
  • Blank grid map for mapping dungeons
  • all on one Letter sized sheet of paper.

Created by ManaRampMatt for the DURF jam.

Artwork by Emiel Boven, DURF is created by Emiel Boven.

Pocket mod layout idea courtesy of Matt Kay.

Enjoy!
